42688866025659.name: Madelaine Milk Chocolate Footballs - 5lb
42688866025659.desc: Sports candy is perfect for parties, events, and more! Madelaine's milk chocolate footballs are a must-try for anyone who loves to watch or play this classic sport. Each is solid, consisting of high quality milk chocolate. The outside is decorated with a brown foil wrapper. A pair of white bands and a black stitched detail create the look of a real miniature football. Enjoy while watching your favorite sporting event!

42688613646523.name: Chocolate Baseballs - 10lb
42688613646523.desc: Batter up! You're on deck to try these Foil-Wrapped Chocolate Baseballs. When you bring these candies home, you'll hit a home run with your family and friends because these candies are fun and delicious!If you have a little leaguer or someone who plays ball, order some of these awesome baseballs to reward them after 9 long innings. Or throw a curve ball into your typical candy dish stock by filling them up with these sluggers. All you'll need is the peanuts and cracker jack when you bring these adorable, fun and delicious Foil-Wrapped Chocolate Baseballs home today.

42690237857979.name: Big League Chew Plastic Baseball With Gumballs And Stickers - 24ct

42689647968443.name: Sports Balls Chocolate-Flavored Foiled Assorted Balls - 24lb Bulk
42689647968443.desc: Chocolate Flavored Foiled Assorted Sports Balls - 24lb

42688863797435.name: Soccer Balls Candy Milk Chocolate Madelaine - 5lb Bulk
42688863797435.desc: Madelaine milk chocolate soccer balls is the perfect chocolate treat for sports fans! Each piece consists of a smooth ball of solid milk chocolate. The outside is covered with a thin layer of soccer ball printed foil in white with red, blue, and black detail. Use them to fill up the candy jar at home or add them to party favors for a sports themed birthday celebration!

42688862814395.name: Madelaine Milk Chocolate Basketballs - 5lb
42688862814395.desc: Madelaine's milk chocolate basketballs will put more bounce in your candy dish. Each piece is made using high quality milk chocolate fashioned into a solid orb. The outside is smooth with a layer of orange foil on top. Black lines and text recreate the look of an actual basketball. Our bulk chocolate basketballs contains many delicious pieces that are convenient for team events, birthday parties, and much more!

42688862093499.name: Milk Chocolate Baseballs Madelaine - 5lb
42688862093499.desc: Madelaine milk chocolate baseballs combine the taste of your favorite candy treat with America's favorite pastime. Each starts with a solid ball of milk chocolate. The smooth surface is protected by a thin layer of decorative foil. The outside is white with a black stitched detail and retro text. It looks just like a real baseball! Combine with our other sports ball candies or enjoy alone to show your love of baseball (and chocolate).

42690251718843.name: Dragon Ball Z  Star Ball Candy Tins - 12ct
42690251718843.desc: Dragon Ball Z Dragon Ball Star Candy 1.06oz Tin - 12ct

42727126859963.name: Chocolate Baseballs Mesh Bags - 24ct
42727126859963.desc: These sporty chocolate candies come in mesh bags that look similar to the bags often used to store tennis balls. Each piece is covered in a thin foil wrapper that's decorated to look like a realistic sports ball!Chocolate sports balls in mesh bags are a delicious treat that arrives ready to eat or give! If you consider yourself an athlete or are planning an event with a sports theme, this is the perfect chocolate ball for you. Each piece is made of solid chocolate that's delightfully smooth. Let each bite melt on your tongue and smother your mouth in rich flavor!Our chocolate sports balls in bulk feature a single design so you can easily choose the right ball for your celebration. Choose from footballs, tennis balls, golf balls, baseballs and soccer balls. Each includes bold color and classic seam and thread designs. Chocolate balls are a great choice for birthday party favors, baby showers and holidays!
